verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> But did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> like unto the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> had cast out יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> For he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִתַּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> had broken down יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> and he reared up מִזְבְּח֤וֹת <S%H4196><s%> altars לַבְּעָלִים֙ <S%H1168><s%> for Baalim וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made אֲשֵׁר֔וֹת <S%H842><s%> groves וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> and served אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> Also he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> altars בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whereof the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> In Jerusalem יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שְּׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> shall my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> be for ever

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> altars לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <S%H2691><s%> courts בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> he הֶעֱבִ֨יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass through אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> his children בָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> the fire בְּגֵ֣י <S%H1516><s%> in the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom וְעוֹנֵ֤ן <S%H6049><s%> also he observed times וְנִחֵשׁ֙ <S%H5172><s%> and used enchantments וְֽכִשֵּׁ֔ף <S%H3784><s%> and used witchcraft וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and dealt א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> with a familiar spirit וְיִדְּעוֹנִ֑י <S%H3049><s%> and with wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> he wrought הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <S%H3707><s%> to provoke him to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פֶּ֥סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a carved image הַסֶּ֖מֶל <S%H5566><s%> the idol אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> which he had made בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> had said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of which God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> to David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H970><s%> young מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> before all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> my name לְעֵילֽוֹם׃ <S%H5865><s%> for ever

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אוֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> Neither will I any more לְהָסִיר֙ <S%H5493><s%> remove אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> the foot יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from out הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> which I have appointed לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> for your fathers רַ֣ק ׀ <S%H7535><s%> but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> so that יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> they will take heed לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> all that I have commanded לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <S%H8451><s%> them according to the whole law וְהַֽחֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> and the ordinances בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

וַיֶּ֣תַע <S%H8582><s%> to err מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> So Manasseh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> [and] to do רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> worse מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> than the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> had destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> to Manasseh וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and to his people וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no הִקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <S%H7181><s%> but they would not hearken

וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> brought יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> upon them the captains of הַצָּבָא֙ <S%H6635><s%> the host of אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיִּלְכְּד֥וּ <S%H3920><s%> which took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh בַּחֹחִ֑ים <S%H2336><s%> among the thorns וַיַּֽאַסְרֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H631><s%> and bound him בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H5178><s%> with fetters וַיּוֹלִיכֻ֖הוּ <S%H1980><s%> and took בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon

וּכְהָצֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> And when he was in affliction ל֔וֹ חִלָּ֕ה <S%H2470><s%> he besought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God וַיִּכָּנַ֣ע <S%H3665><s%> and humbled מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> himself greatly מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> accept אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his fathers

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> And prayed אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <S%H6279><s%> unto him and he was intreated לוֹ֙ וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> of him and heard תְּחִנָּת֔וֹ <S%H8467><s%> his supplication וַיְשִׁיבֵ֥הוּ <S%H7725><s%> and brought him again יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem לְמַלְכוּת֑וֹ <S%H4438><s%> into his kingdom וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> Then Manasseh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> he [was] God

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> Now after this כֵ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> this בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> he built חוֹמָ֣ה <S%H2346><s%> a wall חִֽיצוֹנָ֣ה ׀ <S%H2435><s%> without לְעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> the city דָּוִ֡יד <S%H1732><s%> of David מַעְרָבָה֩ <S%H4628><s%> on the west side לְגִיח֨וֹן <S%H1521><s%> of Gihon בַּנַּ֜חַל <S%H5158><s%> in the valley וְלָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> even to the entering in בְשַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַדָּגִים֙ <S%H1709><s%> at the fish וְסָבַ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> and compassed לָעֹ֔פֶל <S%H6077><s%> about Ophel וַיַּגְבִּיהֶ֖הָ <S%H1361><s%> and raised it up מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> a very great height וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put שָֽׂרֵי־ <S%H8269><s%> captains חַ֛יִל <S%H2428><s%> of war בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> in all the fenced בִּיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַ֠יָּסַר <S%H5493><s%> And he took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> gods הַנֵּכָ֤ר <S%H5236><s%> the strange וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֶּ֙מֶל֙ <S%H5566><s%> and the idol מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <S%H4196><s%> and all the altars אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֛ה <S%H1129><s%> that he had built בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast ח֥וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> [them] out לָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

[וַיָּכֶן כ] (וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H3559><s%> certain ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> and sacrificed עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and זִבְחֵ֥י <S%H2077><s%> offerings שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> thereon peace וְתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> and thank offerings וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לַעֲב֕וֹד <S%H5647><s%> to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

אֲבָל֙ <S%H61><s%> Nevertheless ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people זֹבְחִ֖ים <S%H2076><s%> did sacrifice בַּבָּמ֑וֹת <S%H1116><s%> still in the high places רַ֖ק <S%H7535><s%> but לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [yet] unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וּתְפִלָּת֣וֹ <S%H8605><s%> and his prayer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֱלֹהָיו֒ <S%H430><s%> unto his God וְדִבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the words הַֽחֹזִ֔ים <S%H2374><s%> of the seers הַֽמְדַבְּרִ֣ים <S%H1696><s%> that spake אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> to him in the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנָּ֕ם <S%H2005><s%> behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are among דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> behold they [are written] in the book מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וּתְפִלָּת֣וֹ <S%H8605><s%> His prayer וְהֵֽעָתֶר־ <S%H6279><s%> also and [how God] was intreated לוֹ֮ וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חַטָּאת֣וֹ <S%H2403><s%> of him and all his sin וּמַעְלוֹ֒ <S%H4604><s%> and his trespass וְהַמְּקֹמ֗וֹת <S%H4725><s%> and the places אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֨ה <S%H1129><s%> wherein he built בָהֶ֤ם בָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> high places וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and set up הָאֲשֵׁרִ֣ים <S%H842><s%> groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֔ים <S%H6456><s%> and graven images לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הִכָּנְע֑וֹ <S%H3665><s%> he was humbled הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2005><s%> behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <S%H3789><s%> behold they [are] written עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> in דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> among the sayings חוֹזָֽי׃ <S%H2335><s%> of the Hozai

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> So Manasseh עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֖הוּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> him in his own house וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָמ֥וֹן <S%H526><s%> and Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> [was] two שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years אָמ֣וֹן <S%H526><s%> Amon בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> two שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> But he did הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> as did מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַפְּסִילִ֗ים <S%H6456><s%> unto all the carved images אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> had made מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> which Manasseh אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father זִבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> sacrificed אָמ֖וֹן <S%H526><s%> for Amon וַיַּֽעַבְדֵֽם׃ <S%H5647><s%> and served

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not נִכְנַע֙ <S%H3665><s%> And humbled מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> not himself before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כְּהִכָּנַ֖ע <S%H3665><s%> had humbled מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> as Manasseh אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אָמ֖וֹן <S%H526><s%> himself but Amon הִרְבָּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> more and more אַשְׁמָֽה׃ <S%H819><s%> trespassed
